name: Zuzalu Townhall
description: Michael from Hanity speaks at an event and expresses his excitement about the cold plunge and meeting new people, including Claudia. He talks about expanding his expectations for the future and learning about jurisdictions and states. Michael encourages others to be active and help introverts participate in events. He also announces his plan to set up his ETH validator and mentions a longevity course in May. He thanks everyone for their support and hopes to create more opportunities for people to get involved.
